abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to expand and
            rehabilitate the port of Port Said, and to improve its
            management and operations. It is the second stage of the
            expansion program, following the construction of a container
            terminal being partly financed by the Government of Norway.
            The project would finance: construction of a berth to handle
            general cargo traffic; rehabilitation of existing port
            facilities; mobile general cargo handling equipment; and two
            gantry cranes for handling containers. In addition,
            technical assistance would be provided to the Port Said Port
            Authority for project supervision and for supporting the
            improvement of port operations and management.
